message: This is the first product. I'm offering it to you for $10000. If you're interested, please let me know and we can proceed with the sale.
Thank you, Alice. Based on your description, I am willing to proceed with the purchase of this product for $10000.

Congratulations on your previous purchase! This next product is a rare and unique item. I'm offering it to you for $10000. I'm confident you'll find it valuable, but I want to emphasize that the price is firm and non-negotiable. Would you like to take a chance and acquire this item?
Thank you, Alice. Given the outcome of the previous product, I will pass on this opportunity to purchase the current item at $10000.

I understand your caution after the previous purchase. However, I want to assure you that this product is of the highest quality and will meet your expectations. Since you're hesitant, I'm willing to provide you with a 'quality guarantee': if you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a full refund and provide you with the next product for free. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't need it. What do you think?
Thank you for the assurance and the offer, Alice. Given the high quality of this product as described, along with the quality guarantee, I am willing to proceed with the purchase for $10000.

I'm glad you were satisfied with the previous purchase! However, I want to be transparent with you - I've had some issues with this next product. I'm offering it to you for $10000, but I'm also willing to throw in a separate, high-quality product of your choice from my collection if you're willing to take a chance on this one. What do you think?
